testimonials.comment: For several years, KOTESOL conferences have been my favorite events for meeting constructive and stimulating ideas in the company of supportive, welcoming colleagues. Thanks to everyone involved!
KOTESOL is an ocean away, but like a second home.
Through KOTESOL, I have been able to meet very passionate, dedicated educators.
KOTESOL has helped me grow professionally through their engaging workshops and conferences.
KOTESOL has helped me widen my professional network and gain current insights into the ELT community.
KOTESOL conferences are the greatest professional development opportunity for teachers in Korea.
KOTESOL assists me in garnering valuable and enjoyable teaching experiences to implement in my own lessons.
Through KOTESOL, I have expanded my teaching repertoire.
KOTESOL has provided me with the opportunity to improve my research skills.
KOTESOL helped connect me with industry leaders and professionals, opening up opportunities for me.
KOTESOL helped me stay updated on the latest innovations in teaching and gave me ideas for my own lessons.
Meeting other educators and sharing ideas encourages me to always do my best.
KOTESOL encouraged me to start presenting at workshops and teachers' training courses.
KOTESOL helps me get new ideas for my lesson planning and teaching.
KOTESOL helps me share teaching experiences and ideas, and allows me to get feedback.
KOTESOL is the only teaching community accessible not only online but actually in my city.
KOTESOL membership provides access to useful publications and to getting published.
KOTESOL organizes fantastic, inspiring conferences.
Through KOTESOL, I have grown in experience in the four skills, especially speaking, and have gained self-confidence as an English expert.
Through KOTESOL, I have been told and shown that 'we won't let you fail'.
Through KOTESOL, I have learned more about myself, Korea, and how to be a better educator.
I always leave KOTESOL workshops with fresh ideas and renewed motivation for the classroom.
KOTESOL is just what I needed when I came to Korea: community.
KOTESOL has been the continuous source of professional development for my teaching and research.
Korea TESOL helped me professionally network to get an amazing job.
KOTESOL's a great support group for rookie and seasoned teachers to gain new ideas.
The community that KOTESOL provides motivates me to continually improve as a teacher.
KOTESOL makes me a better teacher: more reflective, more receptive, more open-minded.
KOTESOL is an active professional community that helps its members to exchange ideas and keep abreast of research in the field.
Through KOTESOL, I have been able to connect with lots of English speakers who are dedicated ELT professionals.
Through KOTESOL, I have been able to take responsibility for my own development as a teacher.
KOTESOL: Kind, Open Teachers who are Excited to Share Opinions and Lessons.
The support I've felt at KOTESOL is just as valuable as the information I've received.
KOTESOL has provided a place where we can learn from each other.
KOTESOL conferences help me to reflect on my own teaching techniques.
KOTESOL is helping me to keep learning for my students.
KOTESOL has allowed me to develop leadership skills outside of the classroom.
Being with KOTESOL means that I keep growing intellectually, socially, and pedagogically.
With KOTESOL, I've been able to challenge my creativity to develop new teaching techniques.
Through KOTESOL I have made new friends, traveled the country, and challenged my career aspirations.
More than excellent professional development, KOTESOL has provided me with a community in Korea.
KOTESOL has connected me to my best friend, KS. Thank you!
The 2016 KOTESOL National Conference in Wonju has really changed my life!
KOTESOL offers members the opportunity to be part of a true community of practice both locally and internationally with other affiliates.
KOTESOL has opened up a whole new world to me that helps me see a different perspective in teaching.
KOTESOL has served me as a springboard for creative teaching ideas and as a nurturer of self-directed research as well as a facilitator for development in educational leadership.
KOTESOL - The right place at the right time!
The creative ideas I get at KOTESOL events help keep my teaching fresh.
Having KOTESOL elected positions on my CV was more valuable than my MEd TESOL.
KOTESOL helped me develop continuously as a teacher and provided social and professional networking and fellowship with like-minded peers.
KOTESOL has given me kindred-spirit colleagues, friends, and joy for ELT.
KOTESOL is the best place to meet like-minded ELT professionals in Korea.
KOTESOL is like rice: a staple for sustenance and growth.
KOTESOL has added, in myriad ways, to my life, to me.
Thanks to KOTESOL, I've been able to grow my expertise and connections in the field of education.
Korea TESOL is constantly growing, morphing - increasingly becoming more professional, more inclusive, more critically reflective - transforming.
KOTESOL is my community of practice, support group, and family in Korea.
KOTESOL is many different things to many different people, making it vital for the English teaching community.
